Package cetus.analysis

Class LoopParallelizationPass

  • java.lang.Object
    • cetus.analysis.AnalysisPass
      • cetus.analysis.LoopParallelizationPass
  • public class LoopParallelizationPass
extends AnalysisPass
    Whole program analysis that uses data-dependence information to internally annotate loops that are parallel
